stats.title: Stats
stats.noMatchFoundForCriteria: Not a single match has been found for selected criteria!

players.linkCopied: Link to selected stats has been copied

myAccount.title: My account
myAccount.passwordDoesNotMatch: Sorry, but the old password does not match!
myAccount.emailChangedProperly: Email changed properly. You can log in using new email now.
myAccount.emailRequestSentProperly: Email change request sent. Email has been sent to your new address. Follow instructions to confirm.
myAccount.emailChangeErrorAlreadyTaken: Email could not be changed. It is already taken!
myAccount.leagueJoinOrLeaveError: League name does not seem to be valid!
myAccount.joinOrLeaveLeagueInfo: If you want to join or leave a league, please type its name here and click the button below
myAccount.partOfLeagues: You are part of following leagues:

login.title: Sign in
login.successfull: You have been successfully signed in.
login.UserAcknowledgement:
By logging in, you agree to our
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

loginUsingMagicLink.title: Request magic link
loginUsingMagicLink.ifExists: If an account for {email} exists, your magic link will be sent via email.
loginUsingMagicLink.enterEmail: Enter the email address associated with your account.
loginUsingMagicLink.sendLink: We will send you a link for automagic login.
loginUsingMagicLink.loginWithPassword: Want to log in using old-style password?
loginUsingMagicLink.successLogin: You have been successfully logged in using magic link

forgotPassword.title: Password reminder
forgotPassword.ifExists: If an account for {email} exists, password reset instructions will be sent via email.
forgotPassword.enterEmail: Enter the email address associated with your account.
forgotPassword.sendLink: We will send you a link to reset your password.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.credentialsTaken: Username and/or email is already taken.
signUp.UserAcknowledgement:
By creating the account, you agree to our
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
signUp.successfull: Great! We have registered an account for provided credentials and sent an activation message to you.

error.commonPasswordTooltip: Do not use many reoccurring characters, letters in alphabetical order and common names. Password should contain at least 3 unique characters

logout.title: Logging out
logout.successful: You have been succesfully logged out.

error.title: Error
error.incorrectUsernameOrPassword: Incorrect username/email or password (or account is locked)
error.offline: Either you are offline or our server!

fixInstruction.description: If the button above does not fix it, use below instructions:

code.LEAGUE_NOT_FOUND: Such league has not been found
code.SEASON_NOT_FOUND: Such season has not been found
code.ROUND_NOT_FOUND: Such round has not been found
code.WRONG_DATA_FORMAT: Wrong data format. Are you sure you didn't type it yourself?
code.NOT_A_PLAYER_OF_LEAGUE: You are not a player of such league
code.ALREADY_A_PLAYER_OF_LEAGUE: You are already a player of this league
code.MATCH_MODIFY_ERROR_IS_FINISHED: You are not allowed to modify a finished match
code.MATCH_MODIFY_ERROR_NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to modify this match
code.ROUND_DUPLICATE_ERROR: Cannot create round with that particular number
code.SEASON_DUPLICATE_ERROR: Cannot create season with that particular number
code.INVALID_MATCH_RESULT: Invalid match result for this league

error.notExistMessage: If it ever existed it may have been removed.

menu.youAreNotLoggedInYet: You are not logged in yet

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.description: Make sure that below data match your account and type new password.
resetPassword.successReset: Great! Your password has been successfully reset.
resetPassword.errorReset: Error! Sorry, your password could not be changed for some reason. Maybe the link has already expired.

delete.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this league? It will also delete all seasons, rounds and matches as well (including additional matches). This action cannot be undone
delete.deleting: League is being deleted. Hang tight, it may take few minutes to be completed

league.myScoreboardsInfo: Individual results with each opponent, splited by leagues, sorted worst to best. Includes additional matches.
league.notMemberYet: You do not belong to any league yet!
league.notModerator: You are not a MODERATOR of this league!
league.notPlayer: You are not a PLAYER of this league!
league.name: League name
league.nameAlreadyTaken: League name already taken. Please choose different one

new.wantToShareAdditionalInfoNow: Want to share some additional info about the league?

season.countedRounds: Counted rounds at the end of each season

remove.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to remove the whole season? This action cannot be undone.

remove.title: Remove round

match.fillInstructions: For each game fill only loosing points. Winning points will be automagically filled for you.

typeOfMatch.ONE_GAME_description: Match will consist of 1 game only
typeOfMatch.BEST_OF_3_description: Match will consist of 2 or 3 games
typeOfMatch.BEST_OF_5_description: Match will consist either of 3, 4 or 5 games

winningType.exampleSetResults: Example valid game results will be: {results}
winningType.exampleTiebreakResults: Example valid tie-break results will be: {results}

confirmRegistration.messageFailure: Sorry, your account could not be confirmed!
